articles.title: Inside a Chinese Covid-19 vaccine trial
articles.description: Thousands of people have signed up for the Phase 3 trial of the Chinese Sinopharm vaccine in Peru. Volunteers are being injected with one of the three different things as part of the test. Guillermo Galdos speaks to vaccine volunteers.

articles.description: CNN's Don Lemon speaks with Georgia voter Deborah Jean Christiansen after the Trump campaign has falsely alleged her vote is fraudulent and from a dead person.

articles.title: How Trump is intentionally making things more difficult for Biden

Ananya
